name: ocr_artifacts
description: Data from OCR/PDF extraction with character confusion: O/0, l/1/I, Z/2, B/8
expected_issues: l (lowercase L) vs 1 (one) vs I (uppercase i)
Em-dash vs hyphen from PDF extraction
notes: OCR errors are systematic — the same document will have consistent O/0 confusion throughout. Character-level confidence scores from OCR engines can help identify these.
